sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
import { Box, Grid, Typography, Card, CardContent } from '@mui/material';
import { fetchTotalStaked, fetchTotalMembers, fetchChainSupported, fetchDataSupported } from '../utils/contract/contractInteraction';

const HomePage = () => {
    const [totalStaked, setTotalStaked] = useState('Loading...');
    const [totalMembers, setTotalMembers] = useState('Loading...');
    const [totalChains, setTotalChains] = useState('Loading...');
    const [totalData, setTotalData] = useState('Loading...');

    useEffect(() => {
        fetchTotalStaked().then(setTotalStaked).catch(console.error);
        fetchTotalMembers().then(setTotalMembers).catch(console.error);
        fetchChainSupported().then(setTotalChains).catch(console.error);
        fetchDataSupported().then(setTotalData).catch(console.error);
    }, []);

    return (
        <Box sx={{ maxWidth: 1200, mx: 'auto', p: 4 }}>
            <Grid container spacing={4} mt={4}>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                    <Card>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h5" component="div">Total Staked</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">{totalStaked}</Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                    <Card>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h5" component="div">Chains Supported</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">{totalChains}</Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                    <Card>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h5" component="div">Data Supported</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">{totalData}</Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3}>
                    <Card>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h5" component="div">Total DAO Members</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">{totalMembers}</Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
            </Grid>

            <Typography variant="h4" mt={8} mb={2} sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', color: 'text.primary' }}>
                Welcome to Oracle DAO Controlized
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" sx={{ mb: 4 }}>
                At Oracle DAO Controlized, we are at the forefront of blockchain technology, committed to nurturing and advancing projects built on both EVM and WASM protocols.
            </Typography>

            <Grid container spacing={4}>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h6">Advanced Blockchain Integration</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">
                                Oracle DAO Controlized integrates cutting-edge blockchain technology to ensure seamless interoperability between EVM and WASM protocols, enhancing the efficiency and scalability of decentralized applications.
                            </Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h6">Decentralized Governance</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">
                                Our DAO promotes a decentralized governance structure, allowing every member to participate actively in decision-making processes that shape the future of our technologies and protocols.
                            </Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h6">Support for Multiple Chains</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">
                                We support a variety of blockchain platforms including Ethereum and Polkadot, ensuring that developers have the flexibility to work with their preferred technologies.
                            </Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
                <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                        <CardContent>
                            <Typography variant="h6">Oracle Services</Typography>
                            <Typography variant="body2">
                                Explore how our Oracle services can be utilized within smart contracts to facilitate reliable, real-time data exchange and enhance the functionality of decentralized applications.
                            </Typography>
                        </CardContent>
                    </Card>
                </Grid>
            </Grid>
        </Box>
    );
};

export default HomePage;
